trans-unit.id: Healthiest and biggest salad you can find without forgetting all the flavor

trans-unit.target: La ensalada mas grande y saludable que puedes encontrar sin dejar pasar todo el sabor

trans-unit.note: Title of the internationalization section in settings
Title of the language picker in settings
Toggable option to show or not show the welcome screen

trans-unit.id: This app was made with the purpose of teaching some localization strategies. It includes localization for English, Spanish and Arabic and you can switch between the locales at any time in the settings screen.
trans-unit.source: This app was made with the purpose of teaching some localization strategies. It includes localization for English, Spanish and Arabic and you can switch between the locales at any time in the settings screen.
trans-unit.target: Esta app fue hecha con el propósito de enseñar algunas estrategias de localización. Incluye Inglés, Español, Árabe e incluso puedes cambiar entre ellos en cualquier momento en la pantalla de configuración.

trans-unit.note: Title of the welcome screen section in settings

trans-unit.target: Te damos la bienvenida a FoodApp
